tool:
Phyloseq Richness Plot
bioconductor-phyloseq r-getopt ghostscript
echo $(R --version | grep version | grep -v GNU)", phyloseq version" $(R --vanilla --slave -e "library(phyloseq); cat(sessionInfo()\$otherPkgs\$phyloseq\$Version)" 2> /dev/null | grep -v -i "WARNING: ")
Rscript '${__tool_directory__}/phyloseq_richness.r' --biomfile='$biom_input' --metafile='$metadata_input' --xcolumn="${xaxis_column}" --lcolumn="${legend_column}" --outdir="$htmlfile.files_path" --htmlfile='$htmlfile'
**What it does** Creates an alpha biodivesrsity abundance plot using an R package called phyloseq_.
.. _phyloseq: https://joey711.github.io/phyloseq/plot_richness-examples.html
-----
**Input**
- **BIOM file** - this is a BIOM_ file format - **Metadata file** - this is a metadata file of the experiment design - **Column used for X-axis** - The horizontal x-axis display on the barplot. - **Column used as legend** - select a group from the metadata to fill color to represent the group it belongs to.
.. _BIOM: http://biom-format.org/
